location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Index Map to Accompany Routes in Arabia'

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:445 x 500 mm, sheets 510 x 650 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:General Staff India. S.D.O. No. 1414, December, 1915.Distinctive Features:General map of Arabian Peninsula showing land and river routes across the region. Routes numbered for reference and described in detail in the volume.Contains four inset maps at the larger scale of 32 miles to one inch depicting Al Hasa, Ras Al Khyma, Masqat and south-western Yemen with Aden.
